sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of American Express topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, American Express registers a 16.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 2.4%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 12.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Nike, trading down 1.5%, and Goldman Sachs Group, trading up 0.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
